other_tests.findings: Analysis of thymus-gland tissue obtained by biopsy revealed preserved lobular structures with moderate populations of T-cell precursors. However, typical intralobar corticomedullary distinctions and Hassallâ€™s corpuscles were absent.
Autopsy of Patient 3 revealed cytomegalovirus identified in multiple tissues.
Flow-cytometric analyses showed marked reduction in circulating mature CD3+ T cells (3 to 7 cells per cubic millimeter), with undetectable CD4+ or CD8+ T cells.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Slight reduction in total lymphocyte counts in Patients 1 and 2, with a marked reduction in Patient 3.

other_tests.findings: CD3 d protein was undetectable in thymocytes from Patient 1.
Analysis revealed a reduction in transcripts for all chains of the CD3 complex except CD3 g, as well as T-cell receptor a and b chains.
